question01.question: 01. How would you rate the overall quality of this course?

question02.question: 02. Rate your overall experience of the course?

question03.question: 03. How did this course develop you professionally?

question04.question: 04. Did the courses meet your expectations in terms of providing relevant technical knowledge and skills?

question05.question: 05. How likely are you to recommend this course to a friend/colleague?

question06.question: 06. Were the course materials and resources adequately organized and accessible?

question07.question: 07. Did the courses provide opportunities for practical application of the concepts learned?

question08.question: 08. How well did the courses prepare you for real-world technical challenges and industry demands?

question09.question: 09. Were the assessments and examinations fair and aligned with the course objectives?

question10.question: 10. Did the course evaluations and feedback provided by instructors help you gauge your progress and identify areas for improvement?

question11.question: 11. How would you rate the overall classroom environment and the availability of necessary equipment and facilities?

question12.question: 12. Were the course schedules and timings convenient and conducive to learning?

question13.question: 13. Did the institute provide adequate support services, such as career counseling or job placement assistance?

question14.question: 14. How would you rate the institute's commitment to maintaining up-to-date curriculum and incorporating emerging technologies?

question15.question: 15. How would you rate the effectiveness of the instructors in delivering the course content and facilitating learning?

question16.question: 16. Were the instructors knowledgeable and experienced in their respective fields?

question17.question: 17. Did the instructors effectively communicate complex technical concepts?

question18.question: 18. Were the instructors approachable and available for assistance outside of class?
